Literature.Title: Short Synthetic β-Sheet Forming Peptide Amphiphiles as Broad Spectrum Antimicrobials with Antibiofilm and Endotoxin Neutralizing Capabilities.
Literature.Author: Ong ZY, Gao SJ, Yang YY

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=1.0µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29737(MIC=62.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=15.6µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=62.5µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=31.3µg/ml)
